original_title: NCC, Colts share Club T20 title
original_body_lines: NCC and Colts CC shared the Major Club title after the final at the SSC Grounds today was washed out due to rain.
Lahiru Samarakoon of Moors SC was adjudged the Player of the Tournament while Upul Tharanga of NCC was named Best Batsman of the Tournament.
Lahiru Madushanka of Bloomfield was named Best Bowler of the Tournament.
